=====================================

**Tender Notice: 3PAR Appliance Maintenance and Support Renewal**
==============================================================

**Publication Date:** February 27, 2024
**Closing Date:** March 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

The Government of Canada invites eligible Canadian businesses to submit bids for the 3PAR Appliance Maintenance and Support Renewal. The contract will cover a one-year term, from March 29, 2024, to March 28, 2025.

**Scope of Work:**
-----------------

The selected bidder will be responsible for providing maintenance and support services for the 3PAR appliance to Shared Services Canada (SSC). The scope of work includes:

* Providing maintenance services to ensure the appliance is running smoothly
* Providing technical support to resolve any issues or errors
* Providing training and documentation to SSC personnel as required

**Bid Submission:**
-----------------

Bidders must submit their bids through the Procurement 2 Procurement (P2P) portal. The bids must be submitted before the closing date and time indicated above. The bids will be evaluated based on the total bid price, which includes the prices for all deliverables specified in the solicitation.

**Registration:**
----------------

Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to submit bids. Registration allows access to solicitations, submission of responses, and receipt of updates and amendments. To register, please visit [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and click on the "Register Now" button.
